title: My pointer disappears when playing LOL on windows 10
body: There is not a problem with the graphics neither the launch but when I join the summoners rift or any other fields my mouse cursor disappears. I have tried to fix the compatibility to windows 10 but there is not an option. There are only options for all windows versions except of 10. Is there a way to fix it?

replies.body: This might be due to how you have your Windows Mouse Settings set up.  Follow the steps in our [Mouse Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#wq1) and it should get the hand back on top of the screen!
I will try that. Thank you for your correspondence!
